Configuration.description: The Initial Configuration Setup for Order Management
Configuration.name: Orchestrator

ConfValue.description: Enable Order Purging Post Order Completion
ConfValue.name: Enable Order Purging Post Order Completion

ConfValue.description: Max No of Plan-Fragment Model cached
ConfValue.name: Max No of Plan-Fragment Model cached

ConfValue.description: AOPD Server Amend Plan Generation URL
ConfValue.name: AOPD Server Amend Plan Generation URL

ConfValue.description: Flag to enable or disable the retry of failed OPD request in Orchestrator
ConfValue.name: Retry Failed OPD

ConfValue.description: The number of retries to be done for failed OPD request
ConfValue.name: OPD Retries

ConfValue.description: The time interval in milliseconds between two consecutive OPD retry requests
ConfValue.name: OPD Retry Interval

ConfValue.description: Enable Serialization of Dates as Timestamps
ConfValue.name: Enable Serialization of Dates as Timestamps

ConfValue.description: Flag to enable or disable the overriding of process component destinations from ProcessComponent.props file
ConfValue.name: [Tenant] Override process component destinations

ConfValue.description: Flag to enable or disable using the tenant specific destination for process component
ConfValue.name: [Tenant] Tenant specific destination for process component destinations

ConfValue.description: The Error Handler component to be used in case of failed plan item
ConfValue.name: Plan Item Error Handler Type

ConfValue.description: Should the failed plan item be suspended for amendment to progress
ConfValue.name: ShouldFailedPlanItemSuspend

ConfValue.description: ID of the plan fragment to be assigned to the cancelled plan items which will have No Reciprocal Action to be done in case of amendments
ConfValue.name: [Tenant] No Reciprocal Action Planfragment ID

ConfValue.description: Flag to enable or disable the Order Sequencing
ConfValue.name: Flag to enable or disable the Order Sequencing

ConfValue.description: Custom property xPath expression for order sequencing
ConfValue.name: Custom property xPath expression

ConfValue.description: Pending Order Event Processing Interval in milliseconds
ConfValue.name: Pending Order Event Processing Interval in milliseconds

ConfValue.description: Pending Order Event Offset in seconds
ConfValue.name: Pending Order Event Offset in seconds

ConfValue.description: Pending Order Event Number of Worker Threads
ConfValue.name: Pending Order Event Number of Worker Threads

ConfValue.description: Pending Order Event To Process at each run
ConfValue.name: Pending Order Event To Process at each run

ConfValue.description: Number of planitems for large plan
ConfValue.name: Number of planitems for large plan

ConfValue.description: Application name to show on actuator info endpoint
ConfValue.name: Application Name

ConfValue.description: Filter for Order status change notification; * will publish all
ConfValue.name: Order status change filter

ConfValue.description: Filter for OrderLine status change notification; * will publish all
ConfValue.name: OrderLine status change filter

ConfValue.description: Filter for Plan status change notification; * will publish all
ConfValue.name: Plan status change filter

ConfValue.description: Filter for PlanItem status change notification; * will publish all
ConfValue.name: PlanItem status change filter

ConfValue.description: Filter for OrderAmendment status change notification; * will publish all
ConfValue.name: Order Amendment status change filter

ConfValue.description: OPE Service Offer Validation Secure URL
ConfValue.name: OPE Service Offer Validation Secure URL

ConfValue.description: OPE Service Offer Validation Non Secure URL
ConfValue.name: OPE Service Offer Validation Non Secure URL

ConfValue.description: For SSL Configuration value should be ssl
ConfValue.name: Constant that holds the name of the environment property for specifying the security protocol to use in Tibjms JNDI lookups.

ConfValue.description: For SSL enable verify host value should be false
ConfValue.name: Constant that holds the name of SSL property specifying if client should verify the server certificate in Tibjms JNDI lookups.

ConfValue.description: MilestoneReleaseRequest from Orchestrator to process components queue
ConfValue.name: MilestoneReleaseRequest from Orchestrator to process components queue

ConfValue.name: Order Service Queue

ConfValue.description: Minimum number of concurrent consumers for listener (default 1)
ConfValue.name: Minimum number of concurrent consumers for listener

ConfValue.description: External PreQualificationFailed reply queue receiver count
ConfValue.name: External PreQualificationFailed reply queue receiver count

ConfValue.description: Flag to enable or disable the error handling for failed feasibility request in Orchestrator
ConfValue.name: Enable Feasibility Error Handling

ConfValue.description: Flag to enable or disable the feasibility check for orders in Orchestrator
ConfValue.name: Feasibility Required

ConfValue.description: Flag to enable or disable the retry of failed feasibility request in Orchestrator
ConfValue.name: Retry Failed Feasibility

ConfValue.description: The number of retries to be done for failed feasibility request
ConfValue.name: Feasibility Retries

ConfValue.description: The time interval in milliseconds between two consecutive feasibility retry requests
ConfValue.name: Feasibility Retry Interval

ConfValue.name: External Feasibility reply queue receiver count

ConfValue.name: PlanItem error handler response receiver count

ConfValue.name: PlanItem error handler response dead queue

ConfValue.name: Global Cache Clean Up Topic Name
